text: @realDonaldTrump Meanwhile in Brazil ... The Supreme Court ordered the release of pedophiles, rapists, drug traffickers because of COVID-19 and, today, it ordered the arrest of a Brazilian Youtuber who was protesting the court ... Brazil under the dictatorship of the supreme court ...
